article: What Does Your Birthmark Mean Spiritually?
intro: Birthmarks are abnormalities of the skin that usually present themselves when a child is born. These abnormalities can be different colors, shapes, and sizes.

points.name: What does the location of a birthmark mean?

steps.title: If it’s on your leg:
steps.subtitle: You likely seek adventure if you have a birthmark on your leg. According to superstitions, those with marks on their legs love to travel and explore. Some even believe that the birthmark is a scar from a traveling injury in a past life.
sub-points: Similarly, a birthmark on your foot or toes may have the same travel-loving meaning.
Alternatively, some believe a birthmark on the leg means you need to learn to stand on your own feet or .

steps.title: If it’s on your leg:
steps.subtitle: You likely seek adventure if you have a birthmark on your leg. According to superstitions, those with marks on their legs love to travel and explore. Some even believe that the birthmark is a scar from a traveling injury in a past life.
sub-points: Similarly, a birthmark on your foot or toes may have the same travel-loving meaning.
Alternatively, some believe a birthmark on the leg means you need to learn to stand on your own feet or .

points.name: What does the color of a birthmark mean?

steps.title: If it’s blue:
steps.subtitle: Blue birthmarks indicate a need to get out of your comfort zone. These birthmarks typically come and fade quickly, and many believe this to be a sign to do something new. If you have a blue birthmark, try changing your routine or doing something adventurous—don’t be afraid to spread your wings!
sub-points: Also known as “blue nevus,” blue birthmarks are caused by an overgrowth in pigment-producing cells and are hereditary. The mark is usually harmless if present at birth but can become a problem later in life.

points.name: What does the shape of a birthmark mean?
